name: Let's Study Japanese, A Sexy and Fun Way to Learn Japanese, vol1
name_original: Let's Study Japanese, A Sexy and Fun Way to Learn Japanese, vol1
description:
A Sexy and Fun Way to Learn Japanese
Are you ready to experience a fresh new approach to learning Japanese? Introducing "Let's Study Japanese," an app that utilizes slightly naughty illustrations to make learning Japanese more enjoyable, engaging, and easier to remember.
"Let's Study Japanese" is designed for adult Japanese learners who love Japanese pop culture and anime. In this app, lovable characters guide you through the depths of the Japanese language. The humorous and playful illustrations transform learning Japanese into an exciting experience.
"Let's Study Japanese" consists of 5 parts, each containing the following 4 sections:
1. Conversation Part: In this section, you will learn new words and expressions through everyday conversations with the characters. The conversations progress in real-time and change based on your choices.
2. Conversation Part Review Quiz: This quiz allows you to review the content of the conversation part using the words and phrases you've learned. This helps reinforce new vocabulary in your mind.
3. Word Quiz: A multiple-choice quiz format that tests your understanding of the meanings of the words you've learned.
4. Dictation (Transcription): By transcribing the phrases you hear, you can simultaneously hone your listening and writing skills.
"Let's Study Japanese" is designed for learners to enjoy studying Japanese. The slightly risqué elements make learning more exciting and enjoyable, ensuring that learners maintain their interest in the language. With this app, you too can enjoy learning Japanese from a new perspective.
